name: Bargon Attack
description:
Bargon Attack

Journey to the limits of distress in a Paris like never before ...

By means of the software the BARGON ATTACK, the Bargonians have managed to infiltrate the solar system. If you have a good observation, nerves of steel and quick wits, you will save the Earth from total destruction.

1. Under the Sacré-Cœur dome and behind every Earthman looms the invaders' silhouette ....
2. Under the Louvre the destiny of Earth is being decided.
3. Who is hidden behind this sect? ...
4. From light years ago, a cosmic suspense ...
5. You will be the grain of sand which jams the Bargonian war machine.
